messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: you may be unschooling if
messages.msgSnippet: ...your out to eat and the waiter asks your child what grade he is in and your child proudly states that grades are for eggs and meat. My son did that
messages.messageBody:
...your out to eat and the waiter asks your child what grade he is in and
your child proudly states that grades are for eggs and meat.

My son did that yesterday and was so proud of himself that he had an answer
this time. Thanks for whoever suggested that.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: you may be unschooling if
messages.msgSnippet: you go out and get stuck behind a school bus and are suddenly reminded it s a school day . Mary J
messages.messageBody:
you go out and get stuck behind a school bus and are suddenly reminded it's a
"school day".

Mary J
